name: Chilias, the Oracle
text: When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your hand instead.
flavor: The shining towers in the sky exist to protect the oracles.

name: Dia Nork, Moonlight Guardian
text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
This creature can't attack players.
flavor: Flying is the greatest taboo of any race that has encountered the Guardians.

name: Emerald Grass
text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
This creature can't attack players.

name: Aqua Hulcus
text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.
flavor: Liquid People freely control liquid. For them, water is armor and shield.
